page.title: 18POWER LINES - NATIONAL GRID
page.content:
One interesting feature of our block is the electricity transmission lines which run from the south-east to the north-west. In places these power lines spoil the appearance of the countryside and it would have been better ( but more expensive ) to run them underground.
The power lines ( with pylons spaced conventionally ) run from The Priory in the south-east, past Denbury Farm, past Homelea Farm, close to Pyleigh and up to Handy Cross. Many of the local people call them "ratlines".
